features.featureTitle: Integrate Unsplash placeholder images for each restaurant's 5-photo carousel using the Unsplash Source API format (https://source.unsplash.com/featured/?restaurant,food,interior) or similar food/interior photography queries to ensure high-quality visual content. Each restaurant must have 5 distinct photo URLs that cycle through when users tap left/right on the card.

Render the uploaded gold plate/spoon logo image (image.png) as a static asset in frontend/public/assets/generated with the filename 'dishmatch-logo.dim_200x200.png' and display it in the app header as a circular icon with transparent background.
